description: '''Steve Lawler''' (born 1973) is a British [[house music]] producer and DJ born in [[Birmingham]], England. He is a five time [[List of DJ Awards winners and nominees|DJ Awards]] winner and has held residences at many popular dance clubs such as [[Space (Ibiza nightclub)|Space]], [[The End (club)|The End]] and [[Twilo]].  Because of his successful performances at Space in Ibiza, he was nicknamed "King of Space". Lawler has released several mix albums and is especially well known for his ''Lights Out'' series featured on Boxed.  He currently runs the record label VIVa Music.  He also founded the now defunct Harlem Records leaving a list of creditors in its wake.
